attributes.action: give the electorate an opportunity, through an immediate referendum on the subject, to indicate if they are prepared to be governed by any more unqualified and unelected people who have been appointed to the government through the patronage of the prime minister, and only then because they helped him to stave off his final downfall at the recent PLP meeting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This running of this country is, daily, being subsumed to the control of people appointed to the government by the prime minister who have NEVER been given a mandate by the people - just like the prime minister never has.  The people need to be given an opportunity to state if they are prepared to allow this situation to obtain and having been denied a general election (because the prime minister knows he will lose it, hugely) the people MUST therefore be given a referendum to allow them to voice their opinion.
